scripts.build:esm: node build.mjs esm && pnpm exec tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.watch:esm: pnpm run build:esm && node build.mjs esm --watch
scripts.build:cjs: node build.mjs cjs && pnpm exec tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json --emitDeclarationOnly && cp package.cjs.json dist/cjs/package.json
scripts.watch:cjs: pnpm run build:cjs && node build.mjs cjs --watch
scripts.build: node build.mjs all && pnpm exec tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json --emitDeclarationOnly && pnpm exec tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json --emitDeclarationOnly && cp package.cjs.json dist/cjs/package.json
scripts.watch:umd-bundle: pnpm run build:umd-bundle && node build.mjs umd-bundle --watch
scripts.watch:esm-bundle: pnpm run build:esm-bundle && node build.mjs esm-bundle --watch
scripts.npm:publish: pnpm run build && cd dist && pnpm publish --no-git-checks
